Reviews.Title: “The worst ever!”
Reviews.Author: CarolineNoon
Reviews.Content: flight cancelled quick accomodation 2 days booked hotel simply location graded 4 star time book using stars indication hotel quality reading reviews hotel refurbished live rain started day arrived cold damp attempted heating couldnt spoke reception barely acknowledged told heating switched hot honestly control temperature hotel day 2 rain cold damp helped bathroom fan didnt hairdryer mirror help dry clothes shoes bedding beginning feel damp extra blanket dirty staining top cover bed holes hostel 2stars pushing chose complain staff money hand key service job moved hotel except booked refund windows sound proofed sleeping difficult noise constant traffic people shouting night walls paper thin aswell people leaving 530am experience altogether stayed 4 days axel barcelona superb moving pits real disappointment getting home bad worse tainted memories barcelona learned lesson book referring reviews

Reviews.Title: “Better than expected”
Reviews.Author: RosannaCoates
Reviews.Content: husband stayed 23rd 26th march 2012 expecting worst due previous reviews actual wasnt bad ok dont 4 star standard tea coffee facilities bar closed mini bar empty charged 2 euros day safe staff 1 male receptionist cleaner nice clean breakfast expected meals available hotel excellent position touring eat conveniences existent hold personal possessions camera stolen lady handbag stolen
